title: LONDON, ENGLAND - AUGUST 19: The Ashley Madison website - St. Cloud Times
text:
Despite a massive hack that exposed personal information about million so users, the Ashley Madison dating site for married people is growing, the company said. Ashley Madison says cheating site still growing Despite a massive hack that exposed personal information about million so users, the Ashley Madison dating site for married people is growing, the company said.
